item.title: Ressources and documentation to learn R
item.description: Guides Here are some links to get started with R: R for Datascience Quick-R Datacamp EdX courses YaRrr! The Pirateâ€™s Guide to R LearnR Youtube Channel Stay tuned Here are some links of blogs and such to keep in touch with this evolving field: r-bloggers Miscellaenous This section contains more scoe-focused ressources: Interpretable Machine Learning book Contribute You can contribute to this post by adding more ressources here.
